ACTION_NOT_AUTHORIZED.description: Principal lacks authorization to execute the requested operational action.

ESCALATION_REQUIRED.description: Action requires escalation level that is not satisfied (e.g., IR lead approval).

ACTION_OUTSIDE_WINDOW.description: Action request is outside the permitted response/maintenance window.

SCOPE_NOT_ALLOWED.description: Action is not allowed in the requested scope (e.g., production) under current authority.

ACTION_RATE_LIMITED.description: Action requests exceed configured rate thresholds.
